title: Celtic Flames
description: Kathie shows us clearly that the early Celtic Christians had an awsome relationship with God. Accounts of the supernatural ministries of Patrick, Brigid, Cuthbert, Brendan, Kieran etc. Read how these Celtic christians in the 4th-5th-6th centuries demonstrated the power of God and won the hearts of the people for the Lord. For example, Patrick converted Dublin by raising the kings two children from the dead. Read this and many other wonderful accounts.
author: Kathie Walters
